entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why Platform Target? #29129
  • msbuild /target:Clean;Build doesn't behave as /target:Clean + /target:Build with C# preprocessed files/text templating #29123
  • `dotnet build` is not working when called from a second .NET program #29117
  • VS 17.4.1 .NET Maui Blazor NU1012 NETSDK1045 #29116

Closed

  • Marking the application's assembly as trimmable passes completely wrong input to linker #13999
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With VS 17.5 preview 2 + .NET 7.0.200-preview.22558.7 installed on Loc OS, the template names for IOS and Mac are unlocalized after running "dotnet new --list" in CLI . #28997
  • dotnet test ignores -property command line parameters #29115
  • dotnet test fail to pass MSBuild properties #29114

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29127
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines (#29093) #29120
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines (#29093) #29119
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines (#29093) #29118
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines #29093
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add new option for json output of dotnet list package to release 7.2.xx branch #29017
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid potential NRE #29128
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Disable the windows SDK automated references for c++ #28596
    Area-NetSDK
  • Add error when specifying --output option for a solution #29065
    Area-CLI

Updated

  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #29095
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2048634 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • Add optional logging to MSBuild SDK Resolver #26904
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29094
    Area-Infrastructure
